# Uninstalling Campaign{#uninstalling-campaign}



>[!CAUTION]
>
>These procedures will uninstall permanently Adobe Campaign. All data will be lost.

**RHEL:**

```
rpm -e nlserver6-v7
userdel -r neolane
groupdel neolane
rm -rf /user/local/neolane
```

**Debian:**

```
apt purge nlserver6-v7
userdel -r neolane
groupdel neolane
rm -rf /user/local/neolane
```

**Windows:**

Refer to this [page](../../migration/using/migrating-in-windows-for-adobe-campaign-7.md#deleting-and-cleansing-adobe-campaign-previous-version). Don't forget to remove the Campaign installation folder.

paragraphs: These procedures will uninstall permanently Adobe Campaign. All data will be lost.

rpm -e nlserver6-v7
userdel -r neolane
groupdel neolane
rm -rf /user/local/neolane

apt purge nlserver6-v7
userdel -r neolane
groupdel neolane
rm -rf /user/local/neolane
Refer to this page. Don't forget to remove the Campaign installation folder.
